TopicTitle: Mothership bounces and crashes when rover returns

Articles.Content:
When I flew my motorcycle back to my star cruiser on Minmus, the star cruiser went up into the sky and then fell over.  I was not planning on returning anyway.  This happened about 1.2k away.  This happened in the earlier versions of KSP 1 also.

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12

Had a save with a rover parked in the hills around the KSC. On returning to the rover by way of the tracking station I found the rover upside down 6 or 7 meters in the air and rising - having apparently been flung from the ground on loading.
